workshoptitle: Oracle Database 23ai: Schema Privileges and Lock-Free Reservations

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Introduction to Schema Priveleges and Lock-Free Reservations

tutorials.title: Lab 1: User Creation and Table Initialization
tutorials.description: This lab setup guide covers the creation of users, creation of tables, and insertion of initial data for a database environment. Follow these steps to set up the required users and tables before starting the lab exercises.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Schema Privilege Management
tutorials.description: Learn how to grant specific privileges to users for accessing tables and examine the differences in accessing tables with and without schema privileges.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Lock-Free Reservations
tutorials.description: This lab explores the concept of lock-free reservations and their impact on database transactions.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
